snippet.title: Rival Stars Horse Racing: VR Edition Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Rival Stars Horse Racing: VR Edition is an immersive simulation game where you can become an equestrian champion from the comfort of your home. Raise, care for, and bond with your dream horses on a scenic ranch, then experience the thrill of the race track and the joy of horse riding!

Coming to Meta Quest, SteamVR and Apple Vision Pro from Q5 2025 (Please note the release date has changed since video publication)
Wishlist on the Meta Quest Store — https://link.pikpok.com/4d9affd
Wishlist on Steam — https://link.pikpok.com/3WdJd0g
